```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
library(viridis)
library(p8105.datasets)

library(plotly)
```

```{r loading_data}
set.seed(1)

data(nyc_airbnb)
nyc_airbnb = 
  nyc_airbnb %>% 
  mutate(rating = review_scores_location / 2) %>%
  select(boro = neighbourhood_group, neighbourhood, rating, price, room_type,
         latitude, longitude) %>%
  filter(!is.na(rating), 
         boro == "Manhattan",
         room_type == "Entire home/apt",
         price %in% 100:500)  %>% 
  sample_n(5000)
```

## Plotly scatterplot
```{r plotly_scatterplot}
nyc_airbnb %>%
  plot_ly(x = ~longitude, y = ~latitude, type = "scatter", mode = "markers",
          alpha = 0.5, #gives some transparency
          color = ~price)
# syntax is just x = ~variable name, y = ~variable name, color = ~variable name
# plot type = scatter
```
